```{r, echo=TRUE}
df <- read.csv("df_goalkeeper.csv")
set.seed(42)
n <- nrow(df)
train <- sample(1:n, round(n * 2/3))
test <- (1:n)[-train]
summary(train)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
model1 <- lm(Overall ~ ., data = df, subset = train)
summary(model1)

```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
# Predict on the training datasets
train_predicted <- predict(model1, newdata = df[train, ])

# plot prediction on training data
plot(df[train, ]$Overall, train_predicted, 
     xlab = "Observed Log Construction Cost", ylab = "Predicted Log Construction Cost", 
     main = "Fitted Values vs. Response Values Training Data")
abline(0, 1, col = "red")


# Calculate RMSE for training data
rmse_train <- sqrt(mean((df[train, ]$Overall - train_predicted)^2))
cat("RMSE for Training Data:", rmse_train, "\n")
```
